code: import React from'react';import{Card,Button}from'antd';import'./css/BookCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const{Meta}=Card;const BookCard=_ref=>{let{book,theme,handleAddToList,isInList}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:`book-card ${theme}`,cover:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.image_url,alt:book.title,className:"book-image"}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Meta,{title:book.title,description:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Author: "}),book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Genre: "}),book.genre?book.genre.name:'Unknown']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{type:"primary",onClick:()=>handleAddToList(book.id),disabled:isInList,className:"view-details-button",children:isInList?'Added to List':'Add to List'})]})})})});};export default BookCard;
